title: Cool Devices
synopsis: Welcome to a series of tapes the likes of which you've never seen before! Strong stories, highly charged with erotic content are all presented without Japan's export censorship (as they were intended to be seen).
staff: [['Kotoyoshi, Yumisuke', ['Director']], ['Utatane, Hiroyuki', ['Director', ' Creator']], ['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Umetsu, Yasuomi', ['Character Design']]]
